content.detailedDescription:
i came outside  to sit on my back patio  as i usually do at this time of the morning. it was approximately half an hour ago when i first came out. i looked up into the sky and immediately saw a shooting star. then i looked to the left of where i had seen the star and i saw three lights very close together. i thought at first it was the orion constellation because it was three lights but then i realize that the lights were far too tiny and close together to the part of the constellation. as i continue to want it, the lights started flickering and i saw more lights. and then knew that it was not stars.
i thought that was quite strange so i continued looking at the object and it started to move around in a circular pattern just hovering in place.  this is actually happening as i am writing this. i'm watching the object and the lights appear to be coming on in a triangular fashion looking almost like a christmas tree with all of them are lit up. the object is still hovering in place.  since i saw the object i have seen one other shooting star in to clean the house the object but seem to route themselves around it while jack is still pretty much in the same place it was when i first came out that was approximately half an hour ago. 
 i must say that i've never really believed in ufos so it's strange for me to be even making this reports that this object has caused me some concern and i am interested to find out what it actually is. 
 as i said, the object is still in the sky but i am going inside so i don't know what is going to happen to it. i have posted on facebook to see if anyone in my neighborhood is up, hoping that someone would have a camcorder or camera who could take a picture of what's going on. i have not gotten a response yet.
content.summary: 113 degrees se of my home in brighton ny. currently happening right now but i can't get video on my phone to pick it up. it is just hovering in a circular pattern and has been for at least 15 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
This is the third time iv'e seen this ufo

as far as this encounter.
1. was coming home on moped from friends house and looked up on a dark road and saw it hovering approximately 200 feet away.  it was over to my left an above some tall trees.

2. at first glance it appeared as a bright lantern in the sky glowing orange. looked nothing like a plane and was after a few seconds of hovering moving slowly and glowing brightly of orange to the point you couldn't see any shape around it really

3. from here the object moved along to the north with haussauer st. i turned moped on and sped up after it.  it turned in some local neighborhoods to almost try to evade me or something, it picked up in speed and many direction changes quickly unlike an airplane or even a helicopter.  displayed no other lights just the bright orange

4. my reactions were: as i watch a lot of history channel, wow that is an unidentified flying object. grandpas was royal canadian airfare hall of fame and iv'e never seen a plane or anything look like this.

5. as i came around a turn onto north french the object ascended so quickly and was gone into space or blackness in a blink



on side not a second witness has seen this craft on one of the other occasions i have, all have taken place in the getsville area
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Spotted orange light, followed was going fast, it then took off into space

content.detailedDescription:
I first spotted a very bright light that looked like it could be over liberty when i headed south on 169 just passing the vineyard church. it looked like it was moving really fast in a northeastern direction - but it was going way too fast and it was far too low... 

there is an airport in that direction so i blew it off but then it stopped dead just a little south of staley golf course. i thought i was just seeing things and shrugged it off like "they must have put an lte tower there or something..." and it remained stopped until i got just past the 435 on-ramp to 169.

in the time it took for me to make it to the middle of the shoal creek exit, it had covered so much ground, was so bright... and so low that i was sure it was a commercial plane about to crash. my heart stopped and i stopped the car at the top of the ramp and rolled the windows down. i was more convinced that it was a crashing plane because i couldn't hear any engine just a "swish" like moving air.

just as i was worried for my own safety because the bright light was so close, it passed over my car and i saw it from the belly side. i realized that there were three of those lights - one on each end of three equally spaced wing-like extensions from a circular middle. 

my google search for the military aircraft responsible for this experience will now begin...
content.summary: Thought i was about to witness a commercial plane crash but then i saw the most advanced craft i have ever seen from the underside. it had three lights in a triangular pattern but lights were on three arms extended from inner circle.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend was driving north on tx-121 while on the phone with me, and described the event. he noticed it mainly because it was at night and the object was so bright. at first he thought it was a plane and didn't mention it to me until about after 13 or so minutes, it took off rapidly. he said it had been hovering the entire time he had been driving on the highway. he got excited and a little agitated when i pressed for details, he said it wasn't a cigar shape, but completely flat and didn't leave any trails when it zipped off. after it took off, it just disappeared. he tried to convince himself it was a jet or something, but as far as i know jets don't hover and planes and helicopters have blinking lights and cannot behave the way he described them.
content.summary: Flat bright object hovered for around 13 mins, then took off quickly

content.detailedDescription: It was around 12:oo in july.My wife and i were sitting on the porch on a cloudless moonless night. the exact date is unclear.Being a sky watcher i would always look out the window as we would talk for hours on our porch.As i looked up i saw an orb like object spiraling down in an unusual fashion.Realizing this was not a helicopter i told my wife she had to see this for it was a u.F.O. she came to the window and could not believe what she was seeing.Then the orb flew straight up into the sky and disappeared.Now here's where it gets weird...My wife stood for a moment totally silent,then with a unusual urgency said she had to outside.Standing on the steps she looked up and said look!! as i looked up we saw a triangle u.F.O come down from the sky and start flying towards the house.It was extremely high in the atmosphere but you could tell it must have been huge and moving fast.At the angle i was standing i could not see this for it was now out of my vision but my wife said ..It stopped over our house.By the time i got there it had flown away.When we went back in the porch of course started talking about the incident.My wife still to this day has no memory of the orb which we both stood there and pondered.Two days later taking to my brother who is an avid coast to coast listener told me that same night mufon had reported a triangle u.F.O spotted in barrie ont the same night.I wish i had reported this at time of the incident.
content.summary: Observed orb like object flying in strange downward spiral then decended upwards disappearing then triangle ufo appeared and flewed over house and paused briefly and flew away

content.detailedDescription:
Again, while looking up to view the perseid meteor shower. the object appeared from the sw heading ne. it flew in a straight line emitting no sound. it was in view for about 9 seconds, then disappeared in what seemed to be an upward direction toward space. i think this is the one i just witnessed, it may have turned around and came back in the direction i first witnessed it from. i am not trying to pull a fast one, this is happening. again, i ask why am i seeing this type of stuff?
thank you for your time in this matter. 

sincerely,

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: I think the one i just reported came back.

content.detailedDescription:
While watching for the perseid meteor shower, i was looking in a ne direction, when i saw a starlike object moving toward the sw in a straight line. there was no sound, nor any aircraft in the area that i saw at the time. at about 2124pm this object covered the distance from the ne to the sw in 13 seconds when it finally disappeared from view. it did not waiver from its path, but was extremely fast, there was no sound as i believe i may be too far to hear it. this has already happened in this area before. in july of 2010 i saw what appeared to be a portal open and close in a nw direction from my home. this is the first time i am reporting this too, i've reported other sightings and didn't want to appear as though i am not stable. i am former military. please don't disregard this. there is something up there and i really need to know what is going on. why am i seeing these things? thank you for your time in this matter. 

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: From the ne heading in a sw direction, i saw a star like object fly in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 21:30, august 13th, a family member told me to come outside, and i noticed several star sized objects started moving around. the location was in weld county, colorado, usa, and lasted about 30 minutes. the objects flashed red green during the duration of the sighting, and near the end of it (the time i went inside), all but one of the objects had formed a line in the sky to the southwest of my house. the one object not part of the line continued to move about left to right, up and down, and in circles until i went inside. all the objects continued to flash red and green simultaneously
content.summary: Before a meteor shower

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from date when a lights appeared above me then i raced away
content.summary: Driving home from date when a lights appeared above me then i raced away

content.detailedDescription: I was with my brother and his girlfriend watching the meteor shower and we began to discuss their sightings of ufos and we were sitting there having a cigarette and all the sudden this bright light flashed by beyond these trees and flashed back to where it was then accended rapidly and disappeared i was alittle freaked out because it was so close and seemed to be observing us and i asked if this happens alot and they said all the time. while seeing it fly by really fast it hurt the eyes because it was so bright and fast. the ufo would go one direction then rapidly switch back like i never seen something do before it was amazing but shocking at the same time but when id see it itd hurt my eyes and id blink and the brightness of it would be imprinted on my eyes. it felt very awkward and the bats were going insane dropping from the sky..The object continued to fly back inforth super fast and eventually we decided to go inside because i think my brothers girlfriend found it unsettling and i needed to go home.
content.summary: Kinda hurt the eyes

content.detailedDescription: My name is [name removed/cms/tg] from cornwall ont. canada.Its august 13th and was very disappointed that i had missed the meteor shower the night before do to cloud coverage.While watching netflix i would stop to check to see if i could see a few on this clear cloudless night.During one of my glances i saw a triangle u.F.O at about 500 feet flying at an unbelievable rate of speed.I could clearly see the three lights an a outline of it's triangle shape.It only lasted aprox. 3 seconds and disappeared behind my neighbors.I knew right away what it was for last year in july me and my wife had seen another triangle u.F.O,which i regrettably did not report.After seeing this one i ran up the stairs  saying your not going to believe what i saw.. i was very excited...You are going to find this hard to believe but as i was writing this my wife went out on the porch and came came running back in the house freeked right out  saying there was an hovering object outside the house glowing orange shining two bright lights into the porch then flew upwards into the sky.... this is not a joke my wife is the most honest person i know and would not make this up.The cat was looking out the same window and went tearing up the stairs.If you are interested in this story i have an other amazing story from last july i am compelled to tell.Check july 2014..For we have seen a total of 4 u.F.O's in this area.
content.summary: Watching the skies for metors when a triangle ufo flew over house until out of view at an unbeliveable speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my deck, at about 10;00pm, watching the sky toward the south, perseid meteors about every 2-3 minutes, north to south.  i saw what i thought was a brightly-lit satellite moving from west to east, (about 30-45 minutes after i had seen a definite satellite, directly overhead, moving north to south).  after about a minute or so, the object started to "hook" slightly south.  as this happened, i felt the sensation that it knew i was watching it.  it stopped over a star, near orion's belt, then appeared to "bounce" off the star, back toward the east.  i was able to watch it for about 15 more seconds, then it suddenly disappeared.  i could not see which direction it went.  i have watched the skies for 45 years, and have never seen anything remotely like this with my own eyes.
content.summary: At first, thought a satellite moving west to east.  then it

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a chair outside of my home. while leaning back on the chair and looking into the sky in a northerly direction at that time i watched 3 planes flying north which is normal here because we are surrounded by tampa int l airport and mc dill air force base. the sun was setting in the west almost below the horizon and there were sporadic low dark clouds in the area.  as i looked north i observed a bright craft flying south it seemed to be lit externally with a reddish yellow glow.
i believed that it was a high flying commercial airliner headed too the fla keys or some other southern destination. but, i heard no noise whatsoever that was odd to me since anytime seeing an airplane i always heard some thing no matter how high it was. i also didn't see any wings or tail and no blinking lights at all. the object flew on and went back to watching the sky. within about 5 minutes of the first sighting i saw another bright object same as the previous one this craft came out of the north west and proceed to come in on an angle towards me form n.W. to s.E then it abruptly changed to a southerly course, while the object was making the course change another craft  came from the north and it seemed to speed up to the other and as it  did it made a maneuver to get closer to the other object and then fly south in formation . now i knew it couldn't be commercial airliners they just don't do that kind of thing. so maybe they were military craft but they weren't rigid maneuvers like we see on tv or an airshow it was as if there were no rhyme or reason for the second aircraft in this set to catch up with the first. about 8 minutes later,now very curious about what i have seen, out of the nw west again,but more  north then west as the sun was just about set. i observed another aircraft moving towards me while another craft came out of the north and as before the first craft changed to a southerly course while the second craft sped up to join with other.I personally believe in extra terrestrial life that are actually living here among us. however i don't just believe what im told,i like to investigate and  analyze what im told then i make my best decision.  im writing this because i believe i saw something i cant explain and im hoping you can. i watch your show and what i see in your investigations are honest and trust worthy.Also between the second and third sighting i saw a black helicopter fly north i don't know if they are related sincerely [name removed/cak]
content.summary: While sitting on my patio i saw 5 lights coming from north to south  1 came from the north first then 2 from north  then 2 more

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were enjoying some great weather that night 8/8/2015 @ 9:40 pm out on our second floor back porch when from the corner of my eye i seen what i can only describe as a sunlike orb approaching us slowly from the north, it was less than a half mile from us initialy, i imediately called my wifes attention to it as i knew it was not anything conventional and started recording with my phone we both just watched this sunlike orb move slowly closer to us then changed direction,speed and altitude and vanished so fast we were left dumbfounded and 100% sure that this plasma type orb was nothing conventional.  i only wish the recording i have was a better representation but it is poor quality and i only got a few seconds before it took off in a way that made me believe it knew i was recording it!
content.summary: My wife and i were enjoying the great weather on our back porch when we seen this fireball moving slowly toward us.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard with my dogs, laying down on a picnic blanket. since i live near an airport, i like taking photos and video of the planes as the sometimes fly past us really low. when i saw this particular plane though, it looked peculiar, not like a plane at all but more like a white capsule flying by. it wasn't as low as some of the other, regular airplanes that usually fly by, and even though there are other planes that fly at that altitude as this object seem to be, you can still tell they are planes, you can still see their wing shapes. this thing clearly had no wings and wasn't as thin as airplanes, it was more chunky-looking. it didn't sound like an airplane either, and since there was an actual plane that flew right after, i don't know if the hum sound was from the object itself or from the plane that was approaching the area right after, at lower altitude.  i don't know what the object was and i'm not saying it was a ufo, but it sure looked very different from any of the planes i've observed laying down on my yard many, many times. i don't think this object departed from the airport nearby because it was already flying too high by the time i saw it, and as seen in the video, the plane that came by after clearly had just taken flight from the airport, and it was flying much lower.
content.summary: Strange plane flying in the path usually taken by normal looking airplanes departing from midway airport in chicago.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a valley between mountains & was outside with niece when we saw it come over the mountain-top, flew for a few seconds & made a sudden stop, hovered about 3-4 seconds then flew straight to about middle of valley & changed course from due east to south-east. it came to a sudden stop & regained it's speed in an instant.  not long after we saw a plane, maybe 15-25 minutes later at roughly same altitude (although heading in an opposite direction) & figuring a 550 mph cruising speed was similar to that of a the plane. the size of the ufo , however was maybe 3-4 times larger.  the ufo was not a typical disc-shape but a looked as if it was 2 disc's atop 1 another or a single taller object. you could see the lights ( possibly windows? ) in 2 rows or 2 circles above & below with 1 light at bottom center. there was 4 or 5 lights at each level of the craft.  all lights were a bright white ( no red or green navigation lights, like on a plane). i know we have planes in our inventory that can hover ( harrier , etc.) , but none that i know of that are that big. hell, i'm not sure if we have planes that large...Period!  not sure if this helps but it flew under/through the (ursa major), big dipper constellation. 

below is a picture i found on google-images to give an idea of the general shape , but there was only 4 to 5 lights (i think it was 5) , on both levels.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo came over mountain-top, flew, stopped & hovered with course change.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my puppy outside to go to the bathroom. as soon as i opened the front door i immediately noticed a bright orange light moving upwards from behind a black silhouette of pine trees  situated directly across the street from my house. i was amazed and thought "how cute someone has a drone, and watched the bright orange image hover down the street. it was moving slowly so i opened the front door to call my 8 year old son to hurry up and see this drone. when my son went outside the first bright orange image was hovering down the street at a slow pace. then my son said look mom there is another one. the second bright image was the same exact color. and then i thought wow they own two drones? i was suspicious then. 
my son began to wave at the second orange light. our front entrance-way has a solar operated light and while he was waving his arms trying to get attention from the orange bright light. the light slowed and then broke its  path from the first bright orange light. it started to hover towards us in a very slow fashion and it was getting smaller i watched the bright light it was now directly above us and i was very nervous now asking my son to please stop attracting attention to the bright light that was now hovering above us for about 10- 15 seconds. it then moved the opposite way it was flying south west more westerly. from the first bright orange light. and it was going higher because it was getting smaller. then all of the sudden the bright light was no more like as if a light with shut off. all of the  sudden at a much higher altitude we witnessed an airplane/ with it typical engine airplane sound with flickering lights flying northbound in the sky. i told my son to please go back into the house.
 i was petrified. in shock. i asked my son if he saw the bright lights. he confirmed this. i called the police dispatcher to see if anyone had called in reporting the orange lights.I told her i moved here last november and i also asked if she knew anything about drones being allowed to fly at certain altitudes. the dispatcher said no one called.
i told her this was very strange explained what my son and myself witnessed. she asked me what my address is. then i immediately called my mothers house who lives in the next county.
my left hand is going numb as i type this letter. my right hand is fine however my left hand is all pins and needles trying to type this amazing/frightening/unbelievable experience. i found this website after goggling orange bright light sightings.  forgive my typos. [name removed/cak]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: hovering bright light going in direction. the second followed the first my son was waving to the light and the second orange light was hovering directly over us. i know because i found myself looking directly above myself. i asked my 8 yr old

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road on my way to work early in the morning just before sunrise.. 445 a.M. approximately. i happened to look into the sky and i saw a bright flickering white light off in the distance. wasn't a star. but it resemble one. much brighter and closer so it stood out. it hovered there for a few seconds and i saw it slowly decent to the ground then it just shot straight up into outer space very fast. like you would see in a movie.. i know i saw it. and the rate that it ascended off the ground and into space was definitely not a man made object or form of propulsion.
content.summary: Hovered bright white object in distance decended slowly to ground then ascended really fast into outer space

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend was watching movies in my yard on a projector when i looked up and behind me and told my friend that it was a lot of plane activity when he said that don't look like no plane.   he pulled out his phone to record then it vanished, right from that point another appeared and vanished in the same point then a third and final came same direction. it dd the most activity then vanished. my friend got the video.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought it was a plane first...  then it stopped and moved forward slowly....  with naked eye looked like a straight line but on video it was a ball of light dancing in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
8:10 am, saturday, august 8th,sunny clear blue skies, no clouds. driving my car on road leading to my home. friend and i returning from yard sale down the street. something reflective in the sky caught my eye.  looking-up through top of my car windshield, i see a whitish/silver, elongated shaped, rounded front & back, shaped like a cigar, stationary object in sky.  "what is that" i said to my passenger, turned to look at her, then the road, then back to object in sky. i said, " is that an airplane."  "i don't see wings." my passenger says, "your going to drive off the road." i looked-up through windshield, taking my eyes off the road three times to look at it. the whole time it did not move.  i noticed a funny indentation, mid-center of object.
no other markings, wings, tail, wheels, windows, nothing.  most perplexing of all, i did not stop and get out of car for a better look.  i merely dismissed the whole event, said jokingly to friend, "maybe it's a ufo." she said nothing. i pulled into my driveway, never thought to look-up.  i did not remember the sighting until later that evening.  i could not believe i didn't stop the car, nor did i look-up after parking the car.  i could not comprehend i hadn't remembered seeing this object till hours later. two days later i called friend to ask her what she saw?  she stated she saw something reflective/silver.  she didn't remember event until i called her.
this is my third sighting. first 1987, second 2012, third 2015.  because of previous sightings, thought i would be prepared, would pay attention, if ever happened again. all three sightings have caught me off guard and didn't remember events until hours later or days later. very annoyed at myself, i never stopped the car, got out and really focused on what was stationary in the sky.
my only explanation for my lack of actions, i found in a book i had previously read years ago, entitled, "on the edge of reality" by colin andrews(pg. 54)  "we cannot train ourselves to see something we can't imagine."  "if an object is truly unexpected, people are unlikely to notice it no matter how good(or bad) they are at focusing attention." the only way to see the unexpected is for it to become expected. 
i'm thankful and somewhat relieved my friend was a witness to whatever it was, thus i have no doubt what i actually saw.
content.summary: Driving north on hickory beach rd.  where our home located.  hovering tree top across from our house, long cigar shaped,  rounded front and back/shining/silver/ whitish/ no wings, no tail, nothing indicated an airplane?

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside my home at approx 10:45 pm to look for meteor showers. at approx. 11 pm a friend stopped in their vehicle and we were chatting. at some  point i happened to look up and to my right and there is this line of  four red lights slowly crossing my field of vision. the lights were in alignment as if down the side or bottom of an aircraft..The leading light was smaller  than the next two and then the fourth was the same size as the first. there were no white or flashing lights. my friend also observed the lights. we live in a narrow river valley so the object was lost to view after perhaps 1 to 2 minutes as it crossed a ridge heading east northeast. the red lights didnt have the "bright red" color you normally see on aircraft at night. as to shape of the object..There appeared to be a cloud like haze..Which was probably light cloud cover. if it was a blimp, it was very big. also it made no noise that either of us heard.
content.summary: Watching for meteors. glanced up saw dark object with 4 red lights oriented in straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out at 2 am eastern time to view meteor shower. right away two star like objects flashing different colored lights ranging from blue to red orange got my attention.  they were circling around each other at a high rate of speed. their thrusters or whatever propulsion they use would flash bright each time they would accelerate.  they would move away from each other in random directions in a straight line then change direction instantly and head towards each other as if on a collision course. they would fire some sort of weapon or discharge at each other as they circled each other. then shoot in straight line away from each other and repeat process. never going in same direction each time. after about 30 minutes of this a third object came from due north to their position.  at that time two of them would chase the other and would fire what i would describe as weapons at it. the weapon would strike the other ufo occasionally causing a bright white to reddish flash. after another 30 minutes of them doing battle one ufo looked as though it exploded causing what i would describe as a blast with all color spectrum's. at that time only two lights remained visible and circled each other for another 20 minutes and move around as if they was searching for something.  my wife arrived from work at 3:25 am. at that time i took her out and pointed the two moving objects to her. she could see the flashes when they would accelerate but due to her poor vision they were not visible to her in movement as they were to me as i have perfect vision with my glasses. when i first began witnessing the event i made sure it was not lens flare or reflection caused by my glasses by blocking out any light sources and changing viewing angle.I truly believe i witnessed an alien battle with the death and destruction of one species occupying the destroyed ufo. 
also i witnessed that when they would pass between earth and stars they would block out the star for split second.
content.summary: Three ufo in battle, started between 2 then joined by a 3rd. one destroyed

content.detailedDescription: Last night i, and a few of my family members, observed 2 flying objects, triangular in shape, one much larger. we were watching the sky to observe the meteor shower. the smaller of the 2 joined together with the larger and then abruptly changed direction and proceeded to circle around one another flashing white and reddish lights. the light flashes looked like communication as they would alternate flashing but also flash in unison at times. they continued to hover and make small circles next to each other for over 1 hour. about 35 minutes after this began, i saw 3 more smaller flashing objects come together at a high rate of speed, and then form a straight line perfectly equidistant from one another. then two of them disappeared and one remained. i observed the last of the 3 quickly shoot to the north as the original two continued to hover for about 20 minutes after the last of the other three disappeared. i have never seen anything move as quickly or change direction as abruptly as the ufos i observed. the laws of physics were broken.
content.summary: Multiple ufo sighting in wildwood crest, nj

content.detailedDescription:
I work a third shift so i went to bed at around 4:15 or so. at around 4:25 i heard what sounded like an engine running off in the distance. it has a hum quality to it and vacillates and is not a steady sound. so i got up from bed (second story back bedroom) and looked out the front bedroom window, then went back to my room and looked out back bedroom window that faces mostly forest but with an opening of about 100 feet by 70 feet that is clear of trees.
i saw a couple of shooting stars then from behind a tree came a glowing object that looked to be at the height of a plane would usually be and moving what seemed at the same speed appeared and continued on a straight path contrary to the path the meteorites were taking and moved along steady until all of a sudden the round object flared up and at least doubled in size for just seconds then returned to its previous size. the sky was really clear and many stars could be seen. lost sight of the object because of the trees. still do not know what it was but was thrilled when i was seeing it and sad to see it go.
content.summary: Bright round object traveling at a slow even speed across start night until it expanded inside and glowed brighter for seconds then returned to its previous size and continued on its previous path

content.detailedDescription:
The first one was almost at just above the tall tree level - we have very high ponderosa pines... and it felt like it zoomed just over my head

all seven of these were very unusual and 6 of them traveled on a parallel pathway in the sky - 

they all moved horizontally (not downwards like a shooting star) and several left a very long!!! sparkly tails - some did not 

these objects seemed to respond to planes and would appear moving quickly away from planes on a flight path. 

these were way too close to be shooting stars. 
i have seen hundreds of shooting stars - its very obvious it is debris burning when it hits atmosphere - these were not like that at all..
they were different also due to:
1. its brightness 
2. length and direction (seemed to be moving at a steady pace horizontally across the sky not descending at all like other stars i have seen, it also did not burn out or change its brightness) 
3. altitude - it didn't seem to be as distant as other shooting stars i have seen, its size seemed to be much bigger than anything i have seen and seemed to be only 300-400 meters at the most
content.summary: Seven objects appearing over an hour - moving away from planes flight pattern, qucikly moving light objects

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking our dogs just after dark on pine island florida. all of a sudden we noticed a bright light in the sky, maybe a mile away from us. it was heading east to west at a fast rate but not super fast. it was moving in a straight line. it was a white ball of bright light and was leaving a green trail. we were not frightened and seeing it we were amazed and knew we were not seeing an airplane. having never seen one we did not know if a meteor looks like that or not. we watched the local news that night and all we saw or heard was one broadcaster laughed and asked "did you see the ufo tonight?" we were sad there was not more about it.
content.summary: My wife and i were walking our dogs when we oblseved a large ball of light, with a green trail light. we were wintering on pine island florida. it was moving fairly fast east to west towards the gulf of mexico.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in the backyard about 9pm.  we were watching for meteors during the persides meteor shower.  while looking in the dark sky i noticed a light directly above us and it was a very bright light that seemed to be at a substantial altitude.  at first i thought it was an aircraft because it was moving nnw.  it would be like seeing a spotlight shined from a high altitude.  it moved to the nnw and as the "light" moved it dimmed to nothing.  there were no attitude lights, no strobes or anything like a conventional aircraft.  as the light dimmed i followed what would be the projected flight path for a few minutes, nothing, no lights.  the same exact event happened about five days before at the same time of the evening.  i am an experienced aircraft photographer and i have spent a great deal of my life looking up in the sky observing aircraft.  this object was not an airliner or like anything i have observed before.
content.summary: Bright light, directly overhead, guessing about 15 to 20,000 feet altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
You just could not miss seeing the object!
this was not something that you talked about then unless you wanted to be locked up and the key melted down!
content.summary: This was not something that you talked about then unless you wanted to be locked up and the key melted down!

content.detailedDescription: It’s was 4:08am on the east coast here in connecticut when my buddy and i observed the first object.  we were in the woods sitting on a big rock watching the perseid meteor shower, which was epic in it’s own right.  we probably saw over 100 meteors during the few hours that we were out there.  you could hear the excitement in our voices every time that we saw one.  my buddy’s voice changed from excited to startled when he pointed sw and said, “what is that? do you see that bro? oh my god, what is that?”  as soon as he pointed in the direction i instantly saw what he was talking about.  it was moving quicker across the sky then any airplane could, but way slower than a meteor, it was also glowing bright like a star.  it flew directly over us in clear view for about 10 seconds, as it was making it’s way into the distance two meteors simultaneously fell from the sky straight at it.  it looked like a scene straight out of star wars.  we thought that was amazing, we debated for about twenty minutes about what it could have been.  every hair on my body was standing straight up, it was an amazing scene.  my buddy was all amped up about it, pacing around in circles, he finally sat back down and we both continued to look up.  about five minutes later it was either a second craft or the same one from earlier, i’m really not sure, but i do know it looked a lot like the first one. this craft traveled in the path of a half circle in the sky, kind of like a car making a u-turn.  this is when things get real.  both of us were starring at it as it changed speeds, finally it came to a hover and two smaller objects glowing a reddish orange color appeared over the tree line.  the two objects came up to the larger object on a 45 degree angle from the left and right sides.  all three objects hovered close together long enough for me to take out my iphone to try to capture a video.  the video was pitch black and riddled with profanity and rendered useless.  finally the object on the right moved closer to larger object and suddenly changed direction and shot off into space.  i’d estimate that five seconds later the object on the left did a mirror image of what the craft on the right did as it shot off into the distance.  finally the larger object circled around us again, it was definitely changing speeds as it cruised above us.  my buddy commented that it was trying to trick us into thinking it was a star.  it would move slowly and then stay stationary glowing bright.  at this point the sun was starting to come up and the stars were falling over the tree line.  we didn’t actually ever see the larger craft leave, it kind of moved slowly away from us and eventually disappeared.  it was truly a remarkable experience, one of those once in a lifetime type things.  when those two smaller objects appeared from behind the trees,  i was completely blown away.  it’s a strange situation to be in.  i know what i saw, but at the same time, i have no idea what was up in that sky last night.  i’m just glad that someone was there to witness it with me, otherwise i myself would think that i was crazy.  the whole event lasted about two hours from start to finish.  hopefully by posting this event i can bring justification to those people who witnessed it by themselves.  i’m actually disappointed that nothing online has been posted yet, i was pretty sure that others would have seen it because it was a night where more people were star gazing do to the meteor shower.  thanks for reading.  live long and prosper. i’m now a believer.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5-6 different ufos. one was larger and was clearly changing directions. it met up with two smaller ships that darted out in different directions.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend went to her farm last night in quincy, il to observe a meteor shower. we observed roughly 29 meteors. they were streaking and would stop and we knew exactly what they looked like. during our observation, we noticed a star-sized object moving across the sky from south to east. the rate of travel was unlike anything ive ever seen. from a point of view looking at the stars it could jump from one star to the next in seconds. it would pause, circle, reverse, zig zag and then shoot off. this sighting lasted about two and a haf minutes. another orb re-appeared more east soon after the first object took off, which we assumed was the same object we saw previously. this object was not covering as much area now as when we first saw it, but it was still zig zagging, dropping, and ascending but this time there was a faint beam coming off of it. not too much longer a second orb appeared farther to the left of the object we were observing. so now we are witnessing two ufo's at once zig zagging, descending, and ascending. it almost seemed as if they were watching the meteor shower. after observing these two objects for about 20 minutes, a smaller white/blue light ejected from the second craft and shot across at an incredible lightning speed and re-appeared next to the first craft in the air. both of the first two objects were still moving in no pattern when we left. we were not able to get pictures as our iphones could not pick up the light. we decided there was nothing else we could do and the meteor shower was over and we decided to go home. needless to say we were scared shitless but at the same time intrigued so we started waving to it. we knew it was far higher than any airplane could go and we knew it most likely couldnt see us but we gave it a shot.
content.summary: Three ufo's appeared at different times covering an enormous area with a small ufo coming off one flying to another.
